sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'

const CheckoutBar = (prop) => {
    console.log(prop.state);
    return (
        <>
            <NavLink className={`${prop.state === 1 ? '' : 'nulled'} col px-0 text-${prop.state >= 1 ? 'primary fw-bold' : 'muted'}`} to={prop.state >= 1 ? '/checkout/signin': ''}>
                Ingresa
                <hr className={`border border-${prop.state >= 1 ? 'primary' : 'secondary'} border-3 opacity-75`} />
            </NavLink>
            <NavLink className={`${prop.state === 2 ? '' : 'nulled'} col px-0 text-${prop.state >= 2 ? 'primary fw-bold' : 'muted'}`} to={prop.state >= 2 ? '/checkout/shipping' : ''}>
                Env√≠o
                <hr className={`border border-${prop.state >= 2 ? 'primary' : 'secondary'} border-3 opacity-75`} />
            </NavLink>
            <NavLink className={`${prop.state === 3 ? '' : 'nulled'} col px-0 text-${prop.state >= 3 ? 'primary fw-bold' : 'muted'}`} to={prop.state >= 3 ? '/checkout/payment' : ''}>
                Pago
                <hr className={`border border-${prop.state >= 3 ? 'primary' : 'secondary'} border-3 opacity-75`} />
            </NavLink>
            <NavLink className={`${prop.state === 4 ? '' : 'nulled'} col px-0 text-${prop.state >= 4 ? 'primary fw-bold' : 'muted'}`} to={prop.state >= 4 ? '/checkout/order' : ''}>
                Orden
                <hr className={`border border-${prop.state >= 4 ? 'primary' : 'secondary'} border-3 opacity-75`} />
            </NavLink>
        </>
    )
}

export default CheckoutBar
